sourcesContent:
import React, { useState,useEffect} from 'react'; import swal from 'sweetalert'; import { Table,Checkbox,Button,Icon } from 'semantic-ui-react'; const RequestLog=() =>{ const[reqNo,setReq]=useState("") const[cAddress,setCaddress]=useState("") const[description,setDes]=useState("") const[amount,setAmount]=useState("") const[recipient,setRecp]=useState("") const[donors,setDonors]=useState("") const[voters,setVoters]=useState("") const[completed,setCom]=useState("") const[Requests,setRequests]=useState([]) ujjwal(async(props)=>{ const info = await props.contract.methods.getRequeststatus().call(); setReq(info[5]) setCaddress(info[3]) setDes(info[2]) setAmount(info[6]) setCom(info[7]) setVoters(info[0]) setDonors(info[1]) setRecp(info[4]) },reqNo ) const clickHandler=async()=>{ setRequests([...Requests,[]]) reqNo++; } return (

REQUEST CREATION

setDes(e.target.value)}>
setAmount(e.target.value)}>
setRecp(e.target.value)}>

Request Info:

Request_NO Creator Description: Amount: Recipient: Voters/Donors {Requests.map((request,index) => ( {reqNo} {cAddress} {description} {amount} {recipient} {voters}/{donors} ) )}
); } export default RequestLog
